section.heading: Establishment; purpose.
section.text: There is established a Health Care System Development Commission (“Commission”) to develop recommendations and an implementation plan for developing the health care system.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) addition of §§ 7-2901 to 7-2906, see §§ 1302 to 1307 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

annoGroup.heading: Short Title
annoGroup.annotation: Section 1301 of D.C. Law 13-38 provided: “This title may be cited as the ‘Health Care System Development Commission Establishment Act of 1999’.”
